content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday july 21st, 2009. apx 11:15 pm.

never thought i'd actually say this, but i was looking up at the stars with my friend tonight n by nw of manhattan, ks and we both saw some type of flying object lit up. it looked like the light was getting bigger, then continued on a straight line for awhile until it went behind the tree in our front yard. i hurried down the steps to the driveway to look more ne. right as i looked up a greenish boomerang looking light zipped extremely fast away from me. (the boomerang light seemed to be anywhere from 3000- 4000 feet up, zooming up higher).
i asked my friend,"do you believe i just saw something fly really fast away." he told me he saw it too. i started to shake pretty bad and started debating with him if what we had just seen was real. we sat down in the drive way and looked up and started talking, the whole "what if."
we then started looking south by south west at this cool star that was flickering like crazy. i stood up to get a closer look, and in my view i saw a very light faded object, somewhat hard to see. i asked zach to quickly look up and confirm what i saw. it was a massive hang glider looking thing that looked like it was at an extremely high altitude. to us, it looked like it was going really slow, but it must have been going extremely fast.
my friend claimed "it looked kind of brown, but since its dark, you couldn't tell."
content.summary: 2 objects, one boomerang zipp upwards, massive hang glider type craft very high.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside looking west when a bright yellow orange sphere appeared and went straight west to east maybe a mile high moving at about 4 times the speed of jets i normally see. as it went over it faded out and was a tiny dot much higher than it started and disappeared. i called my wife out to see it and she did not recognize it either.  there was no sound or trail.It would have taken 1/2 a pencil eraser to cover it up.  my thought was it could be the iss but i dont know where it is in orbit.
content.summary: Bright yellow orange sphere west to east solid yellow orange fast moving

content.detailedDescription:
I walked outside my apartment complex to smoke a cigarette and at the time i heard a really weird noise coming from the distance at the time i was thinking "oh my god i hope its not a ufo i hate ufos"

and little be known to me it was......

it flew allmost directly over me it was a giant black triangle (the size of half a football field possibly) with 3 yellow lights and 1 redddish-black pulsating light in the middle.......

my body went into a shock state and i just starred at it in awe and horror at the same time

it looked like it was on a set course at a set speed at a set height

it was cruising not as slow as a blimp just a little faster but it was really errie and creepy it made a wherrrrrring noise really low pitched and deep

( personally i think some are evil ) but that's just me

i felt scared i kissed my cross went inside and prayed when this was over

i lost site of the object when it went over some trees, i didn't bother to run out to the road to see where it went.... i was too freaked out thinking i could possibly get abducted...


below is a picture i found online that is allmost to a t of what i saw
content.summary: Saw a triangle shapped ufo fly overhead

content.detailedDescription: 4 people witnessed total of 12 objects that appear to be moving stars from one horizon to another (no sound). anomalous actions include one object exhibiting a light cycle of illumination for several seconds and then gradual fade to total black for several seconds then again a gradual illumination as it crossed the sky. another object began to fade as it crossed the sky then suddenly appeared to drop as it became intensely bright and appeared at least 5x larger than it had ever been. it soon faded to no light. a couple of the witnesses were frightened as this happened. one appeared so low we thought it was a plane since these star-like objects almost always seem to be at very high altitudes (as if literally moving among the stars).  however, i commented that it looked exactly like what we were seeing high in the sky because it did not flash and appeared to be a sphere of light- but this one was as low as flight-school altitude. we were baffled when the object, which seemed only about a mile away, began to fade and soon vanish right in the middle of the sky. that's when it started to feel surreal. i've been watching the sky my whole life and i can now see these objects seemingly at will the last few months. they travel in all directions and due to the one that i saw very low in the sky i know what i'm seeing are not satellites. look for yourself.
content.summary: 12 total "starlike" moving objects very high in sky, some fading/disappearing, some getting much brighter at times

content.detailedDescription:
I  was outside  looking  at the stars , their  was  broken cloud cover at the time,when i saw  white light  comeing  from  the north  at very high    speed.I also  saw it was  under the clouds.It was moveing  from,north , to south.It seemed to be  changing  speeds, slowing down.And speeding  up.It then made  a quick  circle, then , moved south  at very  high speed.Iwas in  the  yard of my  apartment.I noticed  the  object because  of it speed.I thought  it was a plane.
i was thinking  what is this.
content.summary: Two  white  lights

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching the iss pass by out our bedroom window. after a couple of minutes of watching the iss, we spotted another object traveling in the opposite direction about 5 degrees further wsw of the iss. the object traveled about twice as fast and much brighter. also, unlike the iss lights which appear to blink, this object's light didn't blink at all - the illumination was very constant. we went outside and continued to watch it for a total of 1:30 minutes. it then disappeared as it reached the height of the western sky.
content.summary: Object appeared at same time as iss fly by. path as west to east, and opposite of iss. twice as fast and bright. disappeared as it reached middle of western sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We had just parked our car and let the kids out to go inside when my son looked up and said what is that dad? i looked up and saw what looked like a white dot moving pretty fast that changed into a glowing bag...Like a luminaire thing but with fire melting off of it... i asked my wife what the heck she thought it was and she had no answer. it made no noise at all. i have no idea how high it was because it was dark and really had no reference for it...It travelled from the northwest to the southeast. i grabbed a few pictures with my blackberry and then after about 20 seconds it just dissappeared. the pictures are crappy and only show a white dot and then a reddish glowing dot... i was kind of freaked out because i have never seen such a strange object. my son was freaked out for a day or 2 . 

its weird but when i go to view the picture details it shows that the pictures are from different dates and times... they were all taken within seconds of one another
content.summary: Looked like fire melting out of a paper bag

content.detailedDescription: I plus 4 poeple luking 2 objekt during 10-12 min. i spik not mach english
content.summary: Disc

content.detailedDescription:
About 1:00 a.M. on april 1, 1997, i decided to go out my back door in mathews, virginia to observe the comet, hale-bopp. as i was watching to the north sky, i saw something come from what appeared to be from the comet (or behind it). at first, i laughed at thinking a plane was offering me an illusion it was coming from space. as seconds rolled past, i noticed it appeared to drop into the atmosphere and was coming closer and fast. in addition, the vessel had no blinking lights-just solid ones. i remember thinking no plane could travel that fast, for it had flown from the comet to a distant plane distance in less than one minute.

the spacecraft quickly dropped to just above the vast forest behind the house, quickly slowing down and coming my way. as it approached, it looked like a plane with solid lights, maybe two lights. i had time to think it through that this slow ship just sped in from space. 

to my surprise, the spaceship dropped to just above the trees and passed in a straight line over my head. it passed so slow that i watched the nose go over my head. it was not very wide, and it was almost silent. all i could hear was a low roar. the trees did not move from the wind. the body kept getting wider. i was looking straight up at the dark colored spaceship. it could not have been more than 200 feet in the air. i kept telling myself to be calm. i was exhilarated with curiosity.

the wing i viewed as the right wing spanned across the house and yard. the left wing spanned over the neighbor���s yard. as the wings passed over, i noted the wings were a smooth part of the ship and pointed slightly forward. as the spaceship revealed its back, i saw a large and brightly lit rectangular window with rounded edges. all i could see was a wall of something at the back. i kept thinking it was a computer wall or something similar. 

then, what appeared to be faster than when it sped in, the spaceship left. after the ship passed, it made a sudden jump into the sky, curving nne and then ne and the east and shot over the chesapeake bay into space. in less than five seconds, i saw the ship jump out of the atmosphere. 
i immediately drew pictures and started researching. i wanted to report the sighting, but i stopped talking about it, because when i did, i faced ridicule or ignorance. i never reported it until now. was this ship observing the comet, and did this ship take a side excursion to earth because we were so close? how could a ship travel so fast, quietly slowing to the speed of a slow car quietly, and speed back into space?
content.summary: Huge, dark cigar shaped with wings slightly going forward and a well-lit rectangular window in back.

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation in the province of naguilian philippines. i was staying at my late grandfather's house. i was eating with my aunts, cousin and my mom, after eating me and my cousin decided to go buy cigarettes at a nearby store. so we walk to the store, and decided to sit down, and smoke. as i was looking around and doing smoke circles, a fiery disc approximately, 400-500mph at a 90 degree angle crashes near the rice field of my uncle. which is 800m from where we are. me and my cousin ran to check. when we arrived at the scene my other aunt and my cousin who lives near the rice field were there with 5 other people i dont know, and people that were walking by were also approaching, as we get closer, we saw, the disc and it was huge it was longer than a bus for sure. it was kinda mettalic, some areas where dented, my cousin took out his phone and took pictures right away, he took 3 pictures, the police and the afp(armed forces of the philippines) arrived at the scene, and the police were pushing away the people, to a certain distance, we couldnt see the craft anymore but as we were getting pushed, i heard one militiary guy who was talking to the radio, all i can hear was "clark field..Check it out" as it was really crowded and noisy at the scene. i assume that the us military that is docked in clark field, pampanga are being contacted. i will upload the pictures when i contact my cousin friday. thank you.
content.summary: A disc shaped object crashed near farm field

content.detailedDescription: I was out camping and my cousin and i were sitting and talking when he pointed behind me saying "what's that". i turned around and saw a single small light moving slowly just above the tree level. the light was clearly on the bottom of a larger object but i couldn't make out the shape against the night sky. i figured it was just on the bottom of a helicopter or private tour plane but was perplexed when i didn't hear any noise from the engine. as we continued to watch the light passed over head and suddenly a spotlight turned on and was focused on me for a second or two and the focused on my cousin and then turned off. the craft then proceded to move slowly in the same direction and disappear behind the trees.
content.summary: Flying slowly about just over tree level. spotlight shone down.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog outside my house for his final relief at just before 10 o'clock pm as usual.
i have been an amateur astronomer for about 50 years. i am a physicist and a surgeon.
i noted the night sky. it was hazy but the big dipper and polaris were visible. 
at about 45 degrees above the horizon and due north i noted a 'point of light that i assumed to be a star' that brightened  to about minus forth magnitude and was moving from its initial position at about 10 degrees east of polaris,in a strait line at a constant velocity towards the east about 45 degrees above the horizon.
i estimate the altitude at above 30 thousand feet. as it traveled, it dimmed to a magnitude of less than 1.0 and it moved at a constant speed and heading. 
it disapeared as the sky 'clouded in' after traversing about 20 degrees with respect to my perspective in about 45 seconds...
content.summary: A minus four magnitude flash that fadded away over minutes while moving

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the front porch smoking when i noticed a light out of the corner of my eye.  i looked to the south west and saw 4 or 5 very large, very bright, whitish, orange lights in the sky zig zagging and dancing around one another.  i yelled for my boyfriend to come look and we just stood there watching them zig zagging.  i told him to go get the camera and he ran in the house to go get it and while he was in there, they sank down behind the treeline and their lights just went out.  we saw the same thing the night before around 1:00 a.M. est but there were 5 or 6 that  night on july 17, 2009.  they did the exact same thing both nights.   they made no sounds that we could hear.  i have been outside watching for them again with camera in hand and i hope i can get a photo/video of them.  i have lived around wpafb all my life and these were way too large to be any kind of plane or helicopter lights that the air force has.  i know the difference between airplane lights and what we saw.  our location is about 22 miles south of dayton and our house faces south and the i-75 corridor is very close to our house.  i know someone else had to have seen them, especially since they showed up two nights in a row.
content.summary: Saw 4 or 5  large, bright balls dancing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: we were driving back from holland and since i captured a object with my camera phone a year ago i thought i would take more photos as we drove. when we were near same area i just started taking photos in hopes one would show up. i had read that digital cameras pick up what the eye cannot see so i just took random photos and this popped up. there was actually nothing in the sky that we could see but something did get caught on film. my work requires me to go out to grand rapids at least once a week and i always get a wierd feeling when driving through this area. it freaked everybady out so we did not stop. you can tell it's not a bird by it's realtive size and the picture was taken out an open window.
content.summary: Hovering object near gerald ford airport.

content.detailedDescription:
When i originally witnessed this phenomenon i didn't know about mufon (just discoved this site after a similar sighting happened on july 4th 2009) 

on january 17th around 10pm i was driving south on wyandotte trying to get my daughter to fall asleep when i noticed a cluster of orange glowing lights in the sky over westport. at first i thought they might be airplanes or helicopters but when i stopped and rolled down the window i heard no sound and upon further observation i saw they were too low to be airplanes. 
the main attraction was a cluster of approximately 5 or 6 orbs within relative close proximity of eachother, outlining an almost triangular pattern. they were all brightly illuminated and pulsing, almost like a fire contained within glass. there was no trail of any kind left behind. in the middle of the cluster i did notice one really faint white light moving steadily at the same speed as the others.

when i turned west onto 39th street i noticed three more of these orbs spaced out across the sky almost to the edge of the horizon, also forming the outline of a triangle. all pulsing with the same red/orange fire-like luminosity.

on july 4th, my boyfriend and i witnessed a solitary "fireball" move steadily southward, ironically enough during a conversation about my experience in january.
content.summary: Redorange orbs over westport

content.detailedDescription: We were driving northbound on i-95 early saturday morning going on vacation.  i was in the passenger seat looking out the window towards the east (ocean).  i noticed a black boomerang, oddly shaped object high in the sky not moving.  it was completely stationary and up pretty high in the sky (it was definitley not a kite).  just when i noticed it not moving i noticed a small crop plane flying around it.  probably checking the thing out......Oh if i could find that pilot.  i was able to take 3 pictures of it while we were driving, they aren't great, but i did catch it.  i lost sight of it because we were driving away from it.  my oldest son in the back seat saw it too.
content.summary: Stationary boomerang object sighted early morning.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 8:45pm on july 2nd, i went on the back patio to start the grill.  suddenly an object in motion caught my eye as it moved from w to e above a large tree two houses to the south of our backyard at a height estimated to be about 5000 ft.  i first thought it was just another airplane, but i then realized there was no sound.  also, something just didn���t seem "normal" about the look of this object.  there were no fixed wings, propellor blades, navigation lights, or strobes.  i calmly, but briskly walked back into the house and grabbed my camera and returned to the patio to snap off a few pics before the object left my view.  i didn���t tell anyone else who was playing cards as i didn���t want to create too much excitement, have everyone run outside at once and miss a chance to get some pics taken.  fortunately, the object was still visible, but it appeared to be maneuvering.  when the 2 images are viewed in succession, one can get a good sense of the smooth motion of the object.  it almost appears to have been banking ne as i lost sight of it behind a big tree directly to our east.

the attached photo evidence seems to indicate something other than a fixed wing aircraft that was moving too quickly and at an unlikely altitude to be an approach path into eppley airfield.  at no time was there any propeller or jet engine noise.  we regularly see the omaha police helicopter, commercial jets, and private planes and jets.  they always have some kind of noise when at a similar height as this craft.  the enhanced versions of the pics tend to support my theory that this was a self-contained, dome shaped craft that was under power and control of the occupants.  perhaps this was some type of undisclosed military or other experimental craft of human origins.  based upon my other recent sightings in december 2008 and february of 2009, i am comfortable stating this was not a known aircraft of human design.  thank you for reading and feel free to email with any questions at jbr3adventures@yahoo.Com.
content.summary: Silent object travelling w to e in se sector of sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving my family to atlanta, ga on a vacation saturday morning up i-85n (very near mile marker 34 or 35) just a few miles north of lagrange, ga ... my wife and i were talking and then suddenly we both saw this bright starlike flash in a general line with i-85 but well above the treeline height (assuming several thousand feet in reality).

it was like watching a super bright star in the morning blue sky but this was much much brighter and larger (about 3 times as bright as venus looks in the night sky).  then as quickly as it flashed in its place i could see what appeared to be a silvery bullet or perhaps tear drop shaped object or craft.  i could only see this for maybe a few seconds before it completely & totally blended in with the blue sky.  we did not see it move it was in the same place as the flash before it but as i stated it just sort of faded into the blue sky.

my wife claims all she saw was the bright starlike object but i myself clearly made this silvery craft out before it faded away.  i wish i could report more but this is all we saw.

glenn
content.summary: Starlike flash to object then quickly fading into the blue sky....

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at google earth on my iphone at differenet addresses,   looking at houses down streets looking in the skies above houses    when i looked at my addresse there is a round disk above my house and not above any other houses or adresses ive looked at all my friends and familys adresses and nothing
content.summary: Google earth

content.detailedDescription:
Local ranchers called me in november 2008, a couple of months after mowing down their hayfield. the rancher found some odd circles on which no hay had grown (or had grown and was ruined somehow, leaving the circles). i shot the first four photos in early november 2009 (the ground was wet and had been trampled by cattle). in late may 2009 i shot more photos of the same circles. they are even more pronounced now.

this land has been owned and hay grown/mown for 99+ years by the same folks. the rancher swears these circles appeared sometime last year. they worried him for two months after he noticed them before he finally told his wife, and she finally called me. the ranchers are currently requesting anonymity, but are willing to show them to a mufon investigator.

i don't know if snow "stuck" to them since i was unable to get to them during the winter months.

nothing is growing inside the rings, and the outside edges of the rings actually look a little wider now than they did last fall.

the circles are in a straight line. the west circle appears smaller than the other two (about 8 feet in diameter). the center and east circles are 10'-12' in diameter. they are approximately 60' and 66' apart.

a fourth circle (the small one in the foreground of the landscape shot) is 5'-6' in diameter.

if a line was drawn connecting the circles, the resulting shape would be triangular.

a mutilated animal was found at the top of the low hill sloping up to the south from where the circles are located ������ about 75 yards away from the circles. nobody reported any missing horses or cattle in 2008, so the ranchers are guessing the dead animal was an elk. best guess from the ranchers is that it had been dead for three or four months. (remember, the circles were about three or four months old when i first photographed them.)

the area does have people in it, but (as you can see in the panorama photo) is pretty isolated nevertheless.

the original photos are 12.75" x 9.75" at 300 dpi (about 9 megabytes each). the panorama is about 36" wide at 300 dpi (22 megabytes). i can send you a cd with the original photos if you want.
content.summary: Possible ufo landing site in hay field near angel fire, new mexico

content.detailedDescription:
It about 3:25pm or 3:30pm on july 16, 2009 in winchester, indiana. my mother and i walked out of our front door, which faces east. i heard an airplane flying low overhead, and i just happened to look up at it. the plane was flying northwest-ish, and was flying beneath a cloud. there were a few clouds in the sky, but none straight east, or directly overhead. as i looked at the plane, i shielded my eyes with my hand, and out the corner of my eye, directly overhead, i spotted a moving silver spherical-shaped object. i turned my attention on it and watched as it shot across the sky. it had no backtrail, and it was not shaped like anything i recognized. i don't know if it made noise, because the airplane drowned everything else out. after only a few seconds i managed to ask my mom aloud, "what the hell am i looking at?", and she asked me what i meant. she looked up too, but by that time it had shot across the sky and disappeared into the distance, and she didn't see anything at all. the whole event took less than ten seconds, i'd say. 

i have no idea what it was, but it was not shaped like a plane of any kind. it went too quickly to be a weather balloon, at least i assume it did. i don't know how fast weather balloons go, or even if they can go straight in one direction. i'm not sure how high up it was, but it was at least a mile or more. the only thing that blocked my view of the object were some power lines, but no trees or houses.

i've always wanted to see something, but i never expected to. it kind of shocked me, to be honest, and i wish i'd had it on video or something. i'll be keeping an eye out from now on.
content.summary: I saw a silver, spherical object flying east over winchester, in. it had no backtrail and flew faster than a jet.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:30 am, i was leaving my office for lunch. while walking to the parking lot, i was starring at a clear patch of sky i stare at on a regular basis. this particular day, there was zero cloud cover. the temperature was unseasonably cool and the sky was much clearer and less hazy than most summer days in al. in the patch of sky and to my total disblief, i see a bright speck hovering at an extremely high altitude. in this region of the sky it is very common to see jets flying in a square pattern, making their final approach for birmingham international airport, however, the object i saw was twice the height that planes typically fly. the speck did not move, did not leave a con-trail and did not seem to be gaining altitude. standing there, i tried to convince myself that the object was a high altitude weather baloon. i even considered the possiblity that it was mars. i called another person over to see it and she confirmed what i was seeing. then the object sped away at an extremely high rate of speed. i have personally never seen anything move this quickly. i've never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Very bright, extremely high altitude temporarily stationary object, left at high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i noticed a bright light in the sky moving from east to west then made an abrupt turn to the nw. there where no blinking lights, going to slow for a meteor and to fast and bright for any known aircraft. it was  clear out, so i have know idea of distance. however it was approx 45 degrees above the horizon due north of des moines, iowa. i contacted the nws (kdsm) they had no call reporting the object, but mentioned strange lights have been recently reported in the omaha area recently. also, i contacted the des moines international airport, and they said they also have not heard of any sightings from the tower. both the nws radar and airport radars did not show anything.
i have been chasing tornadoes and storms for over 20 years and have seen some odd things, d/t electric storms, etc. i really have a hard time believing in extra-terrestrial craft. so, personally i feel it is a military object. i'm an aviation enthusiast and understand aeronautics. this thing moved liked no aircraft that i'm aware of and to fast (no sonic boom or blinking lights)and the abrupt turn it made after traveling east to west then the sharp nw turn, i could not even begin to guess the g-forces on that!
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
Between around 10:30 pm and 12 midnight on 7-19/ 7-20-2009 we witnessed several star like objects moving across the sky extremely fast making movments unlike any conventional air craft.  one in particular shot across the sky from the south east, slowed down then the size increased from a tiny star like object to a super bright orb, made a 180 degree turn, decreased back to what looked like a star and shot off again headed south east.  

also to the south west (over what would be the down town detroit city area we witnessed an large object that flickered white red and blue (also looked like an orb) but was moving and hovering up and down side to side.  definitely was moving intelligently and under controll.  did not look like a helicopter/ blimp or other slow moving conventional craft due to the height the object was moving at.
content.summary: Looked like a shooting star until object increased in size, flashed bright white light, made 180 degree turn and shot off into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was working for a engineering company at the time either 2003 or 2004 not sure think it was 2004 and i was in an office working out a steel order when a car entered the carpark directly outside and two men in suits got out and approached the main entrance. i then opened the door to these gentlemen who introduced themselves as fraud squad detectives who wished to interview another person in the building who worked for a different company who shared the premises along with ourselves. while discussing the situation with the detectives in the carpark a metre from the front entrance i noticed a object come into view on my left peripheral vision. while chatting my eyes were drawn to this object and one of the detectives noticed, turned and looked in the same direction and who instantly remarked ' what's that". the three of us then looked at this object with the other detective remarking "that is weird what the hell is it" to which i replied "you're the detectives you tell me"(i know naughty but i couldn't resist it).My guess is it was maybe 6 or 700 feet above ground level, the sighting was in broad daylight, sunny not a cloud in the sky either just before noon or just after.I then put my finger in my mouth and remarked that the wind was blowing from the east, the object came from the west and was headed in an easterly direction hence against the breeze.The object itself was hard to pin down as to it's profile, i thought maybe a microlight as it was similar shaped and it seemed to be of one colour,a mucky brown bronzy colour with maybe a black spot where a head could be,( i suppose it could have been triangular with a protruberance at the front giving it that appearance). anyway we watched it for maybe a minute, it could have been less, it flew in total silence but never altered it's height or course and was really strange. a bit later when we were in the office the detective who first seen it with me remarked again "that was really weird" as he looked out the window to see if it was coming back. i hope you find this of interest as 2 servivg officers were as baffled as i was and they are trained observers. oh as for size i would hazard a guess maybe a couple of meters bigger all round than a microlight. spending 30 odd years in engineering reading blueprints gauging size and distance i think has given myself a pretty good grounding in observation and i,ve lived over airport flightpaths most of my life, whatever the object was i'd never seen it's like before or since. cheers anyway
content.summary: Unusual object seen along with 2 detectives

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up because a neighboring farm's cows were being loud and looked out of the window when i went to use the bathroom. i noticed a blurry comet-like light that appeared to be very, very slowly moving it's position. it looked very high, as if in orbit. 

i wasn't convinced that it wasn't a star at first, but noticed an occasional red blink of light around the edge of it. i also noticed tiny lights (maybe satellites?) moving around the sky, too. it could have possibly been a large star w/atmospheric distortion making it look like there were lights blinking around it, but the tiny satellite-like lights moving in the vicinity of it made me wonder... plus the subtle way it moved... very tiny movements. very creepy. i tried to visualize it from the edge of my bathroom's window pane to see if it was in fact moving, and it was. a hover-like movement.

i woke up my husband and we watched it for a while from our bedroom balcony. he said it was the space station and went back to bed! i totally disagreed since it was so bright. i watched it for about 30 minutes and went to bed, too. i looked online to see if anyone had reported the same thing, but no one has.
content.summary: Bright light in sky hovering

content.detailedDescription: While out on a break i observed what appeared a sphere object coming from the west going south and then disappeared - then shortly another one came from the west and headed southeast and disappeared-right behind another appeared and was going south and then zipped around in a sharp right angle and started going west. i thought the objects were ufo's because it has been a hub of activity thru this area at night between 1 am to 4 am. there was absolutely no noise from the objects and were flying too fast for aircraft. i had to go back in and unknown where they headed to
content.summary: 3 unknown objects flying randomly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: This all happened at around 11:50pm on a sunday 7/19/2009. i was leaving my parents home in northridge, ca near the intersection of balboa blvd and nordhoff st. i was driving north bound on balboa blvd. first noticed lights in the sky as soon as i crossed the intersection with nordhoff st. in the sky to my right hand side, to the north east i noticed several solid bright lights and one smaller multicolored light that was blinking. this blinking light is similar to the blinking lights you see on planes. i couldn't see the outline of the object, the lights i observed made it appear triangular. i initially thought it was an approaching plane to van nuys airport but i thought it was strange to see a plane that late in the evening because of the flight restrictions at van nuys airport, loud planes are restricted because of the disturbance to nearby residents. the more i looked i could tell that it wasn't a plane, it was not moving in any direction, the large triangular object was stationary and appeared to be hovering directly over a neighborhood, it was completely silent i did not hear any noise from the object. i kept looking and then briefly took my eyes off the object to pull into the the neighborhood where i thought the object was hovering over. i parked my car and looked up at the same section of sky and it was no longer there, it disappeared. i didn't see it disappear, when i looked again it was simply gone. if it was a plane i would have been able to see it fly away, but it was simply gone. the moment i realized that it was not a plane, helicopter, blimp... i was in shock, disbelief, amazed, and very surprised about what i was witnessing. after the sighting i was trying to rationalize what i had just seen, but i couldn't. i had goosebumps, the hair on the back of my neck stood up.
content.summary: Large triangular object, hovering in place at a low altidude. bright white lights with one small blinking multicolored light. did not move, it simply appeared and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Large? rectangle over my house 12 miles from white house.

i stepped out of my rear door ( faces due south, 180o) at 19:00 hours and looked up at about 45o, saw 2 lines of lights flashing, appeared to be on an object (it was dark). it is hard to judge size because the lights are receding to the south and i had not seen it directly overhead. the base leg to reagan nat. airport is directly in front of my house, if i were to use a 757 at 3000 feet to guess the size i would guess it to be wider than and longer than the 757. there were 6 lights directly in line on each side flashing they were white. the didn't flash like an aircraft but were on for a second and off for an instant) as it was dark it was hard to guess size and speed. there was no noise. i saw this 12 miles from the white house. 2 helicopters showed up from the north a minute/maybe two later they continued south for several miles and then circled back where they joined almost over my house. they slowed to almost a hover and then continued on to the north. these craft (choppers and ufo) flew 90o across the base leg of regan airport at 7pm with planes landing at less than 1 min. intervals. (although i only saw lights, in that they never changed their relationship to each other i call it a craft) 

as i looked at it i had guessed the size to be maybe as big as a football field traveling at 20 to 30 mph, what made no sense to me was that the choppers did not close on it even though they were doing at least 100 mph. this sighting was constantly on my mind for over a year trying to figure out some of the things that didn't add up until one day i stepped out to look up to see a cloud formation in the sky that cleared all the questions that i had. i now believe that the object was a mile or more sq/rect.. and that it flew directly over the pentagon at 35 to 50 thousand feet which would increase it's speed to well over that of the choppers.

i am seventy two years old, i had a background with aircraft in the army (choppers and fixed wing). i live under the landing pattern of reagan national and see planes landing at dulles to the west of me for 45 years. i am not prone to seeing "things".
content.summary: 12 white lights in square/rectangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
3 friends outside. all were witnesses.

object(s): principally a triangle with white lights near the points, but it appeared to be in other configurations too as it (or they) moved. another smaller object appeared somewhat close to the main object which projected a faint beam between the larger and smaller objects. lights moved in relation to each other, but the object(s) center point remained somewhat stationary, making it difficult to ascertain a set shape, or whether these lights belonged to one object or were actually multiple objects.

the distance of the object(s) appeared to be near cloud level, higher than a private plane but lower than a commercial jet. when in a triangular lighted configuration, the distance between the lights were estimated to be larger than the wingspan of a large plane.

at one point a blue beam was seen between the object(s) and the ground, which disappeared quickly. 

the elapsed time from when the object(s) were first spotted (and were also moving) was about 15 minutes, thereafter it became one light the apparent size of a bright star. 

the object(s) was observed for about 15 minutes after that as a stationary star-like object and then uncertain as to what happened to it.
content.summary: Multiple witnesses - triangle, other shapes - lights
